item.description: Join us for another discussion on Spiritual Experiences. Why do we have these experiences? What do they mean?  How can we learn their purpose in our lives?  This is an open discussion for sharing and listening with open hearts and minds. It's open to people of all backgrounds and beliefs, for spiritual experiences are had by people of all religions, plus atheists and agnostics. Hope to see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be upstairs in the king's daughter's room

group.name: The Central Connecticut Spiritual Experiences Group

item.name: Spiritual Experiences - Why do we have them, What do they mean?
